tutorial_introduction.step1: Welcome to the tutorial of the Lightbulb Game!
tutorial_introduction.step2: Coming up there will be 5 steps that you will have to complete to finish the tutorial.

tutorial_popups.step1: Use the mouse to look at the lamps around the room to turn them on.
tutorial_popups.step2: Uing your keyboard, press the 'W, A, S, D' keys to move around.
tutorial_popups.step3: Now try to move towards the highlighted table and click on it.
tutorial_popups.step4: Pick up the highlighted object and drop it in the vial.
tutorial_popups.step5: Well done! You have now completed the tutorial.
